name: Split Racing Gems
description:
Get ready and hone those reflexes! These hovercrafts are not going to pilot themselves.

CONTROLS :

SHIP 1 :
"A" KEY FOR LEFT
"D" KEY FOR RIGHT

SHIP 2 :
"LEFT ARROW" KEY FOR LEFT
"RIGHT ARROW" KEY FOR RIGHT

Here's a game where you get to pilot two hover crafts, each in their own track, all at the same time.

The goal is simple: Catch as many gems and diamonds as possible without stumbling into the skull mines.

The key is to split your attention and let your reaction time do the rest.

There are 2 modes:

1.) Level Mode: 4 challenging levels.

2.) Endless Mode: Aim for the highest score by catching as many gems, diamonds and combos as possible while also surviving the greatest distance. What will your high score be?

Double the race, double the fun!
